title: Add meta-data
content: As a general user I want to add meta-data on a branch so i can register different activities of a project

acceptance_criteria.criteria: Be able to run 'git tabs meta-data -a'
'git tabs meta-data -a' need a meta-branch parameter
shell must query user for each field on json-schema
Valid json file must be added to meta-branch
Commit the new file to the branch
